p: A recent case series published from New York highlights cases of cardiac arrhythmias in COVID-19 infection, which include high-grade AV block, new onset atrial fibrillation, polymorphic ventricular tachycardia due to a ventricular premature contraction causing a long-short sequence, and cardiac arrest with pulseless electrical activity ( 25). These manifestations suggest various potential mechanisms for arrhythmogenesis.
